column4: I can say that gimp is quite powerful: http://www.gimp.org/tutorials/
what do you use, and why?
I use irssi because it allows me to log in and out of different window managers without quitting irc.. and I can use it in tty 1-6
There are days when I don't even have X running. screen sessions + irssi + elinks allows me to chat and websurf in tty1 ;)
